about_the_game:
Inspired by the brutal boss battles of Cuphead, you must rely on your wit, agility, and intimate knowledge of your surroundings to survive and make your way out. Turn the executioner's chamber against itself as you dodge, weave, and manipulate the environment in your desperate bid for freedom.

  • Master the art of evasion through precise movement skills

  • Cartoon-style animations

  • Face challenging patterns that demand quick thinking and good reflexes

  • Transform the executioner's own tools into your means of escape

  • Customize your controller and keyboard bindings

Controller support included - for the best experience, we recommend playing with a gamepad.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 or AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 or AMD Radeon R5 Graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 460
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
